K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:214b-0: @214b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:214b-1: aom dzny'a n'a ba lo ki te sa manta spha ra na rashmi bha ba sa ma ya ma h'a ma ni du ru du ru hri da ya dza la ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:214b-2: 'bab chu'am mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug ste lag pa g-yas pa'i 'khyor bar chu blugs la ye shes skar mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te chu khyor ba bdun 'bab chur gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:214b-3: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i yi dvags ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i kha zas kyi ro dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:214b-4: btung ba'i ro mchog dang ldan pa 'thob cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:214b-5: yi dvags re re yang kha zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:214b-6: btung ba yul ma ga dha'i bre bdun bdun gyis 'tsho bar byas par 'gyur zhing; chu de 'thungs ba tsam gyis de dag thams cad yi dvags kyi skye gnas las thar cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:214b-7: bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:214b-12: gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa yi dvags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:215a-0: chu la gnas pa la sogs pa @215a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:215a-1: gang gis chu de 'thungs pa re dag thams cad sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:215a-2: sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-034:215a-3: ye shes skar mda'i snying po'o ////
